article: washington -- the house has approved the first increase in federal automobile fuel efficiency requirements in three decades as part of an energy bill that also repeals billions of dollars in oil company tax breaks and encourages the use of renewable fuels .
abstract: house oks boost in fuel standards renewable energy oil company taxes
